thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Gare du Nord La Fayette 10eme - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wheelchair Accessible Rooms close to Eurostar Terminal
thread.title_full: Wheelchair Accessible Rooms close to Eurostar Terminal - Review of Ibis Paris Gare du Nord La Fayette 10eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sjw612016
title: Wheelchair Accessible Rooms close to Eurostar Terminal
text:
Three wheelchair accessible rooms close to station, all on ground floor.
Not large rooms but clean and wooden floor for ease of rolling.
Wet room with chair attached to wall.
The double bed was against a wall so did not have access both sides.
No tea or coffee facilities
Very comfy bed.
Room Tip: Had difficulty with guarantees of wheelchair accessible showers but this hotel has three rooms. See more room tips
